column1: The text introduces the policy, a section, or a group of practices, but it does not mention a specific practice.
The policy makes generic security statements, e.g., "we protect your data" or "we use technology/encryption to protect your data".
The site collects your demographic information for analytics or research. Collection happens by a named service or third party.
Users with accounts can view their information, within the scope of information the company has learned about the user.
The site collects your generic personal information for a basic service or feature. Collection happens on the website.
The site collects your unspecified information for personalization or customization. Collection happens on the website, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
The site collects your website activities for analytics or research. Collection happens by a named service or third party.
The site collects your generic personal information for personalization or customization. Collection happens in an unspecified way, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
You can use third party privacy settings to control the use of unspecified information by an unspecified party for analytics or research.
An unnamed third party does track on the first party website or app your cookies or tracking elements for targeted advertising.
The site collects an information type outside of our label scheme for analytics or research. Collection happens by a named service or third party.
An unnamed third party does not receive your unspecified personal information for an unspecified purpose. You can opt in for data collection.
A named third party does receive unspecified information about you for targeted advertising. The data is aggregated or anonymized.
The text does not fit into our label scheme.
A named third party does track on the first party website or app unspecified information about you for targeted advertising. The data is aggregated or anonymized.
The site collects your cookies or tracking elements for advertising. Collection happens when you implicitly provide information on the website.
The site collects your unspecified information for marketing purposes. Collection happens on the website, and your data is identifiable.
You can opt out (by contacting the company) from the use of unspecified information by a third party, which collects or receives it for analytics or research.
Users with accounts can edit their information, within the scope of information explicitly provided by the user.
A named third party does do something unspecified with unspecified information about you for targeted advertising.
The site collects your generic personal information for advertising. Collection happens in an unspecified way, and your data is aggregated or anonymized.
